Sentencas: The performance stability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) under thermal and redox cycles is vital for large-scale applications.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, we investigated the effects of thermal and redox cycles on cell performances of flat-tube Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) anodesupported SOFCs.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Cell performance was considerably affected by the duration of oxidation during redox cycles and the heating rate during the thermal cycles.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell tolerated 20 short-term redox cycles (5 min oxidation) without significant performance degradation.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Besides, the cell exhibited superior stability during 8 thermal cycles with a slow heating rate (4 & DEG;C min-1) to that with a fast heating rate (8 & DEG;C min-1).
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results reflected that the thick anode support (2.7 mm) offered strong resistance to the shocks caused by redox and thermal cycling.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the morphological changes of the Ni phase during the redox and thermal cycling were investigated using Ni-film anode cells.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Agglomeration of Ni particles and dissociation between the Ni film and the YSZ substrate were confirmed after 5 redox cycles, whereas no significant changes in Ni film emerged after 8 thermal cycles. & COPY; 2023 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Understanding thermal and redox cycling behaviors of flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells
